titleStmt.title: An excellent conceited tragedie of Romeo and Iuliet As it hath been often (with great applause) plaid publiquely, by the right Honourable the L. of Hunsdon his Seruants.
Romeo and Juliet
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter [and Edward Allde?],

notesStmt.note: Second printer's name conjectured by STC. "Danter pr[inted]. only quires A-D".
Running title reads: The most excellent tragedie of Romeo and Iuliet.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
